name: Modiste Tailor Theme (Demo)
description:
Modiste is a Figma UI Kit for Tailor Businesses. It comes with 40+ beautiful screens for the Landing Page as well as a Customizer for tailoring a suit.


Use this UI Kit to streamline your design for any Tailor or E-commerce Website. With over 300 components and defined global styles, you can easily drag and drop components and change their styles to cater to your needs


Buy from

  • Appsumo
  • Creative Market
  • Themeforest
